item.description: Hello ! Get ready to be engulfed in the mystery of this classic and critically acclaim spy thriller this Sunday afternoon. Let's enjoy it, as our New England Patriots are NOT playing this week. Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy (2011) R 127 min - Thriller - In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet agent within MI6's echelons. It stars Gary Oldman as George Smiley. Warning: This movie features British accents, a scarcity of female characters and, allegedly, the complete absence of killer robots. After the movie, those that want to can stay with the group and grab dinner wherever we decide. The movie starts at 3:50 PM.
item.name: Let's see Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy !!!
